title: Can't buy missing runes
body: Basically what is shown in the two pictures. I'm trying to buy runes that I still don't have and I can't buy them, I checked the rune tap on my profile and the runes aren't there either.

replies.body: Are you certain you haven't used them in Rune Page?
No, they're not in my rune pages and as you can see in the first picture, it shows that I own NONE of those runes.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

If you still experience this afterwards;

Communicate with Riot’s [Account Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


 * Under the secondary select **Account.**


  * For the tertiary category select **Management**




http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/riotkayle_banner.jpg?itok=ikhDcpBV
Welcomed. Did the repair work or did you communicate with Riot's Account Support Centre?
I had to communicate with them. ;/

Got a solution from a fellow Summoner, let us know if it works;

Go over to your rune page (Not in champ select), it will should take you to your corrupted page. Return all the runes manually and click save. The problem should be solved.

I checked the store issues section and it wasn't what I'm looking for. Also yeah I just noticed I forgot to add the links to my pictures. 

http://imgur.com/3ktBKoO
http://imgur.com/2ZO9x7U

There we go!

If you are unable to view content in the store or it appears empty then you may be experiencing a configuration or connection issue.  This is commonly due to a setting from Internet Explorer among other possibilities.  As a first step, I recommend going over our[ store error ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty)guide to work towards a resolution.  Let me know how this works for you!
You forgot to add your pictures. You need to upload them online somewhere first (such as imgur or gyazo), then right click and copy the image address/URL to paste here.
